entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
